Specifically, it expands the expedited licensing to include  retransfers, removes the congressional notification requirement on  certain AUKUS transfers, requires a report on implementation of  expedited review for export licenses, and requires an annual review of  the Excluded Technology List to ensure the list is relevant and aligned  with AUKUS goals.
